name: AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason
desc: The reason for asking the client to retry a content key request.

items.name: static let receivedObsoleteContentKey: AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason
items.desc: An obsolete key response that was set on the previous content key request.

items.name: static let receivedResponseWithExpiredLease: AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason
items.desc: A key response with an expired lease that was set on the previous content key request.

items.name: static let timedOut: AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason
items.desc: A key response that wasnâ€™t set soon enough.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a retry reason with a string.
